snippet.title: Crypt Custodian - Official Announcement Trailer | Guerrilla Collective 2023 Showcase
snippet.description: Arm yourself with a broom and get to cleaning up the afterlife in this announcement trailer for Crypt Custodian, an upcoming Metroidvania game coming to PC in 2024. Check out the trailer to see the world, meet some of the ghosts, combat, and more! In Crypt Custodia, you take on the role of Pluto, a mischievous cat who has died, and is sentenced to be the afterworld's janitor forever. Hang out with other doomed ghosts, battle beasts, and explore a vastly expansive landscape.
